title: Shovel Knight v1.2.3B Steam
description:
== About the game:

Shovel Knight is a sweeping classic action adventure game with awesome gameplay, memorable characters, and an 8-bit retro aesthetic created by Yacht Club Games. You play as the eponymous Shovel Knight, a small knight with a huge quest. Shovel Knight has come to this valley with two goals: to defeat the evil Enchantress and save his lost beloved. He wields a ShovelBlade; a multipurpose weapon whose techniques have now been lost to the ages. Always honest and helpful, Shovel Knight is a shining example of the code of Shovelry: Slash Mercilessly and Dig Tirelessly!

However, between Shovel Knight and his beloved stands a cadre of villainous knights. These terrible foes, known as The Order of No Quarter, have been dispatched to prevent Shovel Knight from reaching the Enchantress at any cost!


== Features:

Sweeping adventure with classic action.
Dig! Run! Jump! Explore! and platform your way through themed stages filled with secrets.
Handcrafted pumped-up 8 bit style. A labor of love!
Detailed, living background and animation! Big, beautiful pixels!
Crazy bosses and lovable characters.
A light touch to narrative with humor and levity.
Discover and master multiple relics!
Amass riches to upgrade your armor and weapons.
Awesome soundtrack by Jake Ã¢â‚¬Å“VirtÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Kaufman and additional songs composed by Manami Matsumae!
Hone your skills in Challenge Mode!
Retell the adventure and uncover all of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s secrets with New Game+!


== Version:

Steam v1.2.3B from 27.01.2015. and cracked by ALI213 
(ALI213 is Chinese hence those weird Chinese letters in folder, nothing to worry about)
Steam version is bigger than GOG only because it naturally contains Visual C++ 2010 and DirectX setups
The only difference to v1.2.3A GOG is below


== Version changes:

1.2.3B A tiny update today which address two input issues: 
Fix: Unable to enter bindings menu with a controller while another device is detected as disconnected in slot zero. Pretty common with Bluetooth devices. 
Fix: Mac bindings for Retrobit NES USB adapter didn't include bindings for the dpad.


== Instructions:

Extract anywhere with compression software (like 7-Zip link below)
Launch from ShovelKnight.exe or create shortcut to it
Enjoy & Seed.

GeForce 8600 GS/Intel HD Graphics 2000 Desktop
2 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9
200 MB hard disk space

To properly enjoy the game (based on user input from Game-debate.com):

GeForce 9500 GT/Intel HD Graphics 4000 Desktop
2 GB RAM 
Win 7 64
DirectX 10

Recommended:

GeForce GT 440/Radeon HD 5550 512MB
2 GB RAM 
Win 7 64
DirectX 10
200 MB hard disk space
